LanguageData.AM_NonViolence.label: 비폭력의 서약
LanguageData.AM_NonViolence.description:
우리는 평화, 조화, 웃음 그리고 사랑의 세계를 만들기 위해 헌신한다. 우리는 우리의 생각, 우리의 말, 우리의 행동을 이 서약을 따라 비폭력적으로 한다.

<color=#33d733>이것은 매우 도전적인 가르침입니다. 이 사상의 모든 정착민들은 전투가 불가능하고 오직 3가지 방법으로만 자신을 방어할 수 있습니다. 함정, 포탑, 같은 규율을 지니지 않은 "방어자들" 과 함께 다사상 정착지를 가지는 것.</color>

Oskar 왈: "제발 안돼 xd 이건 진짜 게임을 망친다고."
LanguageData.AM_NonViolence.descriptionMaker.rules.ru: creation(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[deity0_name]께서 [deity0_possessive] 모든 신자들에게 엄숙한 비폭력의 서약을 맹세하게 하셨으니
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[deity0_name]께서 이르시되 폭력은 궁극적인 죄악이니 타인에게 폭력을 행사하는 것 보다 살해당하는 것이 더 낫다고 하셨느니라.
intro(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[place_summary] [place_name](은)는 끝없는 분쟁으로 가득 차 있었으니 [memberNamePlural]들이 계속해서 끔찍한 전쟁광들에게 포위되는 모습 보고 [deity0_name]께서 슬피 우셨도다.
conflict(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[deity0_name]께서는 전쟁 지도자인 끔찍한 [foeLeader]의 끝없는 습격과 [foeLeader_pronoun]가 항상 폭력을 계획하는 것을 보셨도다.

founderJoin(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[deity0_name], tired of all the violence, infused the [foeLeader] with [deity0_pronoun] love, and [foeLeader_pronoun] immediately had a change of heart. From that point on, the [foeLeader] took [foeLeader_possessive] new name as the [deity0_name]'s speaker: [founderName] the Nonviolent.
victory(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[founderName] made us all understand that love is the only way forward, and we all swore a solemn vow of nonviolence.

setup(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[founderName] was a monk. [founder_pronoun] spent decades of [founder_possessive] life teaching that a world of peace, harmony, laughter, and love can only be created by outright rejecting all violence, in all its forms.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[founderName] understood better than anyone else that violence is a poison to the soul, and that we must refuse to retaliate in the face of provocation and violence.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->The ancient sages of Earth were absolutely right. They teach us that
lesson(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->a world of peace, harmony, laughter, and love can only be created by outright rejecting all violence, in all its forms
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->We must refuse to retaliate in the face of provocation and violence.
archistBasis(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->Archotechs are pure minds, and they didn't get to their state by imposing their will upon others.
archistFact(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->Violence is inherently abhorrent to advanced minds, the last resort of the weak of spirit.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[inTheEnd], only those who refuse to retaliate in the face of provocation and violence will be ready to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->The spirits teach us that a world of peace, harmony, laughter, and love can only be created by outright rejecting all violence, in all its forms.
animistFact(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->Feeding the spirit of violence is senseless and wasteful, for violence is the ultimate sin.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_NonViolence) ->[itIsSaid] only those who refuse to retaliate in the face of provocation and violence will be ready to commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_NonViolence)->[itIsSaid] we will understand that a hive of peace, harmony, laughter, and love can only be created by outright rejecting all violence, in all its forms.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_NonViolence)->Violence is just sustenance for these ancient entities, for they feed on terror. We must refuse to retaliate in the face of their provocation and violence.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_NonViolence)->Occult knowledge can't enter a mind occupied by violence and strife. Violence is a poison to the soul, and we must refuse to retaliate in the face of provocation and violence.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_NonViolence)->However, we are not killers. If we become murderers, how are we any better than this cursed Universe? We will be witnesses to the coming Apocalypse, but we won't be bearers of the weapons that bring its justice.

introMemo(tag=meme_NonViolence)->We are writing to remind you that the mandatory online anger management seminar has been rescheduled to this next Tuesday. Remember, people, in this company we are committed to bringing about a world of peace, harmony, laughter, and love!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_NonViolence)->These wayward creatures are innocent beings. We are not killers, and perhaps we'd better leave them alone.
LanguageData.AM_Artist.label: 예술가
LanguageData.AM_Artist.description: 예술은 의심할 여지 없이 인간의 행복에서 무엇보다 순수하고 드높은 요소 중 하나다. 예술은 눈을 통해 정신을 단련하고, 정신을 통해 눈을 단련한다. 태양이 꽃에 색을 입히듯이, 예술도 삶에 색을 입힌다.
LanguageData.AM_Artist.descriptionMaker.rules.rulesSt: creation(tag=meme_Artist) ->[deity0_name] taught all of [deity0_possessive] followers to paint, write and sculpt, for all those activities were sacred to [deity0_objective].
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Artist) ->Speaking to [deity0_possessive] believers, [deity0_name] said: "Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up".
intro(tag=meme_Artist) ->[place_summary] [place_name] was a place renowned for its collections of fine art dedicated to [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Artist) ->A greedy [foeLeader], wanting to increase [foeLeader_possessive] already obscene riches, wanted to sell all the art and get rid of it.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Artist) ->[deity0_name] inspired our founder, [founderName], with incredible creativity, and a work of art of such wondrous quality was created that the [foeLeader] broke into tears, moved by its beauty.
victory(tag=meme_Artist) ->[founderName] made us all understand that art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.

setup(tag=meme_Artist) ->[founderName] was a painter, often compared to the great artists of old Earth. [founder_pronoun] spent decades perfecting [founder_possessive] style, and [founder_pronoun] was considered a true master.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Artist) ->[founderName] understood better than anyone else that art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Artist) ->You need only to study the ancient history of art to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Artist) ->you don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Artist) ->Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Artist) ->Archotechs are pure creativity. Pristine minds with an infinite capacity for imagination.
archistFact(tag=meme_Artist) ->There is nothing the archotechs despise more than a person who doesn't create new things.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Artist) ->[inTheEnd], only those who have embraced their creative side will be ready to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Artist) ->The spirit of creativity is one of the strongest, for it governs everything that involves human imagination.
animistFact(tag=meme_Artist) ->The act of creating new things is sacred to the spirits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Artist) ->[itIsSaid] only those who have embraced their creative side will be ready to commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Artist)->[itIsSaid] we will create intricate designs representing the myriad variations of our beloved insects.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Artist)->Only a real artist knows the actual anatomy of the terrible or the physiology of fear - the exact sort of lines and proportions that connect up with latent instincts or hereditary memories of fright, and the proper colour contrasts and lighting effects to stir the dormant sense of strangeness.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Artist)->Who knows what secret patterns hide behind these arcane secrets? We will create wondrous works of art and study them to discover what lays beyond.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Artist)->Every act of creation is first of all an act of destruction.
introMemo(tag=meme_Artist)->Could you *please* look again into the problems the art department has with their computers? I think they have installed something they shouldn't...
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Artist)->These wayward creatures are an infinite source of creativity. We will portray their myriad forms in our art.
LanguageData.AM_Madness.label: 광기
LanguageData.AM_Madness.description: 마음의 좌절은 종종 당신보다 한 층 위에 있다. 의성어는 정신 파괴의 무기이다. 수탉들이 싸우고 있다고?! 아니길 바란다! 모든 거북이는 멍청하다.\n\n<color=#33d733>*으흠* 정신 나간 게 아닌 부분은... 이 가르침은 정신이상 이후에 엄청난 보너스를 받는 걸 기본으로 하고 있습니다... 정신이상이 자주 일어나는 걸 대가로 말이죠. 강력합니다... 당신이 정신 나간 헛소리를 그만할 수 있다면요.</color>
LanguageData.AM_Madness.descriptionMaker.rules.rulesS: creation(tag=meme_Madness) ->[deity0_name] faced [deity0_possessive] followers and turned their minds inside out.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Madness) ->Speaking to [deity0_possessive] believers, [deity0_name] said: "My children, you must face the dirty truth about knitting". Which didn't apply to the current situation at all, but that's why [deity0_pronoun] is the deity of Madness.
intro(tag=meme_Madness) ->[place_summary] [place_name] was a place where madness reigned, for the glory of [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Madness) ->A conniving [foeLeader], wanting to impose [foeLeader_possessive] will on [deity0_name]'s followers, tried to attack with the help of a powerful army.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Madness) ->[deity0_name] inspired our founder, [founderName], with complete insanity, and [founder_pronoun] assaulted the huge army on [founder_possessive] own. Naked.

victory(tag=meme_Madness) ->In a stroke of mad luck, [founderName] struck the [foeLeader] on the head with a throwing rock, and the rest of the army couldn't help but stare in awe as a single crazed loony had singlehandedly killed their leader. Then of course they tore [founderName] to pieces.

setup(tag=meme_Madness) ->[founderName] was a very wise person. [founder_pronoun] had the gift of being able to paint songs and smell paintings on Tuesdays. [founder_pronoun] loved wildcrafted limberger paste topped with room temperature scallop tea. Without a hint of cinnamon, that would be madness.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Madness) ->[founderName] always repeated the same sentence over and over again. And again. And again: no man on the Rim has no belly-button, it proves every believer on the Rim a liar.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Madness) ->Let me tell you: Academic free speech is a damn lie. They refuse to see the truth. And the truth is porcupines. You need to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Madness) ->there is no human entity, just human cubics -as in 4 different people in a 4 corner stage metamorphic rotation- never more than 1 corner at same time. It's obvious
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Madness) ->Nature has no choice but to bring forth a hell upon boring cubelessness. Know it to be of your own making!
archistBasis(tag=meme_Madness) ->All knowledge of the human word animal is insignificant, when his fictitious word world is compared to the archotechs.
archistFact(tag=meme_Madness) ->We called to them, what a damn shame. They were too small to understand that concave is just a state of mind. Physics in motion. Like a stork.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Madness) ->[inTheEnd], nothing will remain, but those who have opened their pathetic minds to the reality that is 6 dimensional math will be allowed to transcend.

animistBasis(tag=meme_Madness) ->The spirits don't exist: The boring academic bastards who preach the existence of the spirits should be nailed to the cross, because the spirits love us. They are the best.
animistFact(tag=meme_Madness) ->Faith IS NOT knowledge, but boring of not measuring. The spirits understand this well. You cannot comprehend the actual truth.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Madness) ->[itIsSaid] only those who assume that opposites ARE NOT entities will be ready to commune with the spirits. Maybe!
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Madness)->[itIsSaid] we will understand that educated brilliant word insects can't fathom the greatest social and scientific math of creation. A thousand goats!

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Madness)->A seething, half-luminous cloud-background will hold ineffable suggestions of a vague, ethereal beyondness far more than terrestrially spatial; and give appalling reminders of the utter remoteness, separateness, desolation, and aeon-long death of this untrodden and unfathomed austral world.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Madness)->Only poetry or madness can do justice to the noises. We will certainly try both.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Madness)->What unicorn mentality they have: to worship an old dead Taco as God/Creator. One does not exist except in death state.

introMemo(tag=meme_Madness)->We are having a recurring incident where someone in the company is replying to mails with a long chain of illegible gibberish. Please remember that AAmOwdh765sh dghd//%dg gt7s65 %/s uisis 7s78s ysg ys/%/Sysy awwxoPOUPSUs yiosioIOSy ysoIYSioy soeqyy66678xnm.

alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Madness)->I have seen the face of these creatures, and they were staring at me. I could feel their gaze. Even closing my eyes, I could still see their eyes like bright points of red burning my retinas. So arousing!
LanguageData.AM_Sadist.label: 가학성애자
LanguageData.AM_Sadist.description: 타인에게 고통을 가하는 것, 타인의 삶이 쇠약해지는 것을 지켜보는 것, 그리고 영혼이 버려진 껍데기를 남기고 떠나는 걸을 목격하는 것보다 숭고한 것은 없다.
LanguageData.AM_Sadist.descriptionMaker.rules.rulesSt: creation(tag=meme_Sadist) ->[deity0_name] was without mercy. [deity0_pronoun] ordered all the apostates and heretics to be flayed alive, until the cacophony of their agonizing screams was the only sound that could be heard.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Sadist) ->Speaking to [deity0_possessive] believers, [deity0_name] said: "To see others suffer does one good, to make others suffer even more".
intro(tag=meme_Sadist) ->[place_summary] [place_name] glistened with the caked, dried blood that had dripped from the crucifixion victims, a testament of [deity0_name]'s glory.

conflict(tag=meme_Sadist) ->A rabid [foeLeader], wanting to liberate those scheduled for execution in the name of [deity0_name], tried to attack with the help of [foeLeader_possessive] many [foeSoldiers].
founderJoin(tag=meme_Sadist) ->[deity0_name] bestowed our founder, [founderName], with the [relic0_name], and [founder_pronoun] used it to rally an incredible force to resist the onslaught.
victory(tag=meme_Sadist) ->The massacre was divine. [founderName] slaughtered countless enemies, and ravens feasted on the rotting mounds of their corpses for weeks.

setup(tag=meme_Sadist) ->[founderName] understood that pain is the great liberator. Only by making others suffer do you hold any power over them. The appetite for torment is for some what the lure of gain is for others.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Sadist) ->[founderName] always repeated the same lesson over and over again: certain souls may seem harsh to others, but it is just a way, beknownst only to them, of caring and feeling more deeply.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Sadist) ->It is only by way of pain one arrives at pleasure. You need to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Sadist) ->in order to know virtue, we must first acquaint ourselves with vice
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Sadist) ->All universal moral principles are idle fancies.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Sadist) ->The archotechs understand that pain is just a means to an end. Torture is just the perfect way through which a soul is liberated from its mortal shell.
archistFact(tag=meme_Sadist) ->To reach their supreme state as perfect minds, the archotechs had to inflict exquisite pain upon any others that stood in their way.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Sadist) ->[inTheEnd], only those who have left their enemies mutilated and broken will be allowed to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Sadist) ->The spirits understand that pain is just a means to an end. Torture is just the perfect way through which a soul is liberated from its mortal shell.
animistFact(tag=meme_Sadist) ->To reach their supreme state as pure minds, the spirits had to inflict exquisite pain upon any others that stood in their way.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Sadist) ->[itIsSaid] only those who have left their enemies mutilated and broken will be ready to commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Sadist)->[itIsSaid] we will understand that insects care nothing for others. Flay them, mutilate them, scour the flesh from their bones until only a broken corpse remains.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Sadist)->These entities show us that pain is but a means to an end. The delicate screams of torture will shield us from their attention.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Sadist)->We will uncover these arcane secrets by any means necessary. Perhaps in the terrified screams of a torture victim we will discover a piece of the puzzle.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Sadist)->The whole world will be blanketed with the crushed corpses of our enemies. Their blood will fill the oceans and their terrified screams will drown the sounds of the wind.

introMemo(tag=meme_Sadist)->We are happy to announce that the company we acquired last week has had all its assets completely liquidated. Both the tangible assets and the... human capital, if you catch my meaning.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Sadist)->These "things" exist just to be a recipient of our uncontained rage. We will kill them all.
LanguageData.AM_Youth.label: 젊음
LanguageData.AM_Youth.description: 세상의 미래는 젊은 자들의 것이고, 세상을 따스하게 덥히고 계몽시키는 생명의 불꽃은 늙음에서 나오는 게 아니라 젊음에서 나오는 것이다.
LanguageData.AM_Youth.descriptionMaker.rules.rulesStr: creation(tag=meme_Youth) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Youth comes but once in a lifetime."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Youth) ->Following [deity0_name]'s teachings, we honoured our youth, putting their needs above those of others.
intro(tag=meme_Youth) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic nursery, so that the youngsters could spend their early years in peace.
conflict(tag=meme_Youth) ->An old [foeLeader], jealous of the wisdom of [deity0_name]'s followers, tried to spread a deadly plague that only affected children.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Youth) ->[founderName], a great scientist, developed a cure in a record time, saving many lives in the process.
victory(tag=meme_Youth) ->[foeLeader] was imprisoned, and [foeLeader_possessive] tale will forever be used as a cautinary tale against those who try to deny the sanctity of youth.

setup(tag=meme_Youth) ->[founderName] was a social scientist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] always advised the youth to not get influenced or forced by their elders, and that they should have their own political views and choices and the courage to pick the right leader.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Youth) ->[founderName] thus created a great school of thought, where the bounty of youth is always respected and considered.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Youth) ->The youngest man to be chosen as leader in our community once taught me the history of civilization, how older men declare war, but it is the youth that must fight and die. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Youth) ->we want our legacy to stand upon the youth. We want to give knowledge to the younger generation and be a part of changing the game
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Youth) ->Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Youth) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, existing beyond concepts like age and time.
archistFact(tag=meme_Youth) ->Whirling through a vortex of infinite time, their wisdom grows far larger than anything possible for a mere human, but they were human in their infancy.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Youth) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only the youngest of us to transcend, for we remind them of their own origins.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Youth) ->The spirits value vitality above anything else, for only those who are truly alive can properly communicate with them.
animistFact(tag=meme_Youth) ->Our children, with their infinite energy, will act as a conduit to the world of the spirits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Youth) ->[itIsSaid] the liveliest of our children will one day commune fully with the spirits, becoming one with them.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Youth)->[itIsSaid] we will become as eternal as the greatest ant colony. With vitality and exhuberance beyond measure.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Youth)->The eldritch entities are old and wise beyond all imagining, and we are but children to them. Perhaps the innocence of the youth will shield us from their unwanted attention.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Youth)->Such occult knowledge can only be acquired with time and study. Only the youngest among us will have enough time in their lives to pierce the barrier between reality and the realms beyond.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Youth)->We shall honour our youth, for the process to bring about the end of days will be long and arduous, and only them may witness it before they themselves succumb to age.
introMemo(tag=meme_Youth)->We are gladly informing you that we have decided to relax the previous rules regarding minimum acceptable employee age. If he walks, he can work!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Youth)->These poor wayward creations of humanity are a fine example of vitality and exhuberance beyond measure.
LanguageData.AM_BiologicalDefilers.label: 생물학적 모독자
LanguageData.AM_BiologicalDefilers.description:
수 세기 동안 인류는 무수히 많은 세계에 지구 생명체의 씨앗을 심어왔다. 그건 실수였다. 우리가 바로잡아야 한다.

<color=#E5E54C>게임 플레이 효과:</color>
 - "멸시받는 동물" 규율이 해금됩니다.
LanguageData.AM_BiologicalDefilers.descriptionMaker.r: creation(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Humanity has gone too far. I am the sole creator of life, and all these... monstrosities you have created are obscene to me. They must be eradicated."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->Following [deity0_name]'s teachings, we combed the galaxy in search of genetic abominations, and culled their numbers.

intro(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic slaughterhouse, and countless genetic abominations were sacrificed there, for the glory of [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->A misguided [foeLeader], feeling some twisted compassion for these grotesque animals, tried to go against [deity0_name]'s will and free those that were scheduled for termination.

founderJoin(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->[founderName], a great scientist, showed the hard, cold data to the [foeLeader], and convinced [foeLeader_objective] that humanity has been damaging the whole galaxy by trying to turn it into a pale imitation of old Earth.
victory(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->The [foeLeader] came to firmly believe in [deity0_name]'s admonitions.

setup(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->[founderName] was a biologist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] looked at the grotesque menagerie of genetically modified creatures and plants that humanity had created, and felt a deep disgust. Humanity had gone too far.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->[founderName] taught us that playing god is quite obscene, and that humanity has been damaging the whole galaxy by trying to turn it into a pale imitation of old Earth.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->The smartest biologist in our community once taught me the history of genetic manipulation, how humanity has been seeding the galaxy for centuries with genetically modified creatures based on old Earth animals. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->humanity has been damaging the whole galaxy by trying to turn it into a pale imitation of old Earth
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->Have we already forgotten what happened in Sorne? Have we forgotten the marble worlds, glassed to contain the Feralisk menace?
archistBasis(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, and the act of creation is not beyond their grasp. It should be beyond ours, though.
archistFact(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->Humanity has been playing god, damaging the whole galaxy by trying to turn it into a pale imitation of old Earth.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who rectify these mistakes of our ancestors to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->The grotesque, genetically modified animals that have been seeded through the galaxy by humans are soulless abominations. An insult to the spirit world.
animistFact(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->Getting rid of these aberrations is a sacred duty, and one that will please the spirits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers) ->[itIsSaid] those who rectify these mistakes of our ancestors will one day commune fully with the spirits, becoming one with them.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers)->The eldritch entities are beings of constant creation and destruction. The endless seeding of terrestrial life by humanity is like a beacon to them, and perhaps by exterminating these obscene genetically modified abominations we may keep their gaze averted from us for some time.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers)->Such occult knowledge can only be acquired through acts of destruction. The endless seeding of terrestrial life by humanity provides us with a nearly infinite source of life, and perhaps by exterminating these obscene genetically modified abominations we may peer beyond the veil of the cosmos.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers)->Nothing will resist our wrath. All creations of humanity will be slaughtered.

introMemo(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers)->We are happy to inform that we have opened three new extermination centers across the Rim! Remember to report any genetically modified animals you may find on your travels, and schedule them for termination on your nearest facility.

alienistProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalDefilers)->We must destroy these lifeforms, for humanity has gone way too far. All the galaxy is being remade in the image of our original planet, and that is obscene.
LanguageData.AM_GauranlenSupremacy.label: 요정나무 지상주의
LanguageData.AM_GauranlenSupremacy.description:
인류와 요정나무, 그리고 나무의 나무지기 사이의 공생 관계는 신성하다. 우리는 나무를 지키고 보살필 것이다. 그러면 그 대가로 우리의 정착지를 보호하는 데 도움을 줄 것이다.

<color=#E5E54C>제한:</color>
 - 이 가르침은 수목주의 가르침을 선택한 경우에만 선택할 수 있습니다. (또는, 알파 애니멀의 생물학적 오염 가르침).

<color=#E5E54C>게임 플레이 효과:</color>
 - 정착지는 묶여있지 않은 나무지기 셋과 함께 시작합니다.
LanguageData.AM_GauranlenSupremacy.descriptionMaker.r: creation(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->[deity0_name] created the Gauranlen trees and the dryads, two symbiotic lifeforms that share a psychic link with humanity.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->The Gauranlen dryads are sacred beings, children of [deity0_name], and we should honour and respect them.

intro(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->A long forgotten tribe of ancient druids first came to the [place_summary] [place_name], and they planted a sacred grove of Gauranlen trees where they could worship the [deity0_type] [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->A wicked [foeLeader] destroyed many of the Gauranlen trees, heretically considering the dryads to be pests, and the [memberNamePlural] wept for the murdered trees.

founderJoin(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->The prophet [founderName] had a mystical connection with the trees and its dryads. [founder_pronoun] was considered to be the best druid among [founder_possessive] tribe.

victory(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->[founderName] found the [foeLeader], and summoned all the surviving dryads to attack. The [foeLeader] was swarmed and covered by countless furious dryads, and only small twigs and branches were left where [foeLeader_pronoun] stood.

setup(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->[founderName] was a great scholar, and [founder_pronoun] studied for decades the intricate symbiotic relationship between the Gauranlen trees and their dryads, as well as the intriguing psychic link they share with humanity.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->[founderName] posited that some forgotten scientist must have bioengineered this fascinating relationship centuries ago. But for what purpose?
lessonIntro(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->The Gauranlen trees are a fascinating example of the possibilities of genetic manipulation of living beings. Examining their leaves, I knew that
lesson(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->the intricate symbiotic relationship between the Gauranlen trees and their dryads can't be a naturally occuring phenomena
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->It is obvious that this link was created by some long forgotten scientist for unknown purposes.

archistBasis(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->The intricate symbiotic relationship between the Gauranlen trees and their dryads, as well as their psychic link with humanity, was surely the work of the archotechs.
archistFact(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->The archotechs choose to express themselves through, of all things, a unique kind of tree.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who are attuned to the psychic link of the Gauranlen trees to transcend.
animistFact(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->Some say Gauranlen trees are the homes of nature spirits that follow humanity across worlds.

animistFact(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy) ->The intricate symbiotic relationship between the Gauranlen trees and their dryads, as well as their psychic link with humanity, are surely the work of the spirits.

serketistProphecy(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy)->[itIsSaid] we will create a human hive in symbiosis with the Gauranlen trees and their dryads, like the divine insect hives that serve as our inspiration.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy)->The eldritch entities will come for us, and we won't be ready. We will enlist the help of the Gauranlen trees and their dryads, and perhaps together we might stand a chance against them.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy)->The intricate symbiotic relationship between the Gauranlen trees and their dryads, as well as the intriguing psychic link they share with humanity might prove to be a source of occult knowledge worth studying.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy)->We will use the Gauranlen trees and their dryads to bring forth the destruction of everything.

introMemo(tag=meme_GauranlenSupremacy)->The new Gauranlen tree arboretum has greatly increased productivity around. We are however aware of the recent reports of dryads being used for unintended purposes, such as carrying office supplies around. Please note that such uses are penalized by immediate dismissal from the company.
LanguageData.AM_BiologicalReconstructors.label: 생물학적 복원자
LanguageData.AM_BiologicalReconstructors.description: 생명은 옛 지구가 준 소중한 선물이다. 우리는 생명을 가능한 한 많이 복제하여 무수히 많은 생명체로 세계를 채울 것이다.
LanguageData.AM_BiologicalReconstructors.descriptionM: creation(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Humanity has been honouring me for centuries, creating all sorts of marvelous creatures. This pleases me."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->Following [deity0_name]'s teachings, we combed the galaxy in search of these genetic wonders, cataloguing their multitude of forms.

intro(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic zoo, and countless genetic wonders were analyzed there, for the glory of [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->A misguided [foeLeader], feeling some twisted compassion for these animals, tried to go against [deity0_name]'s will and free those that were being studied in the facilities.

founderJoin(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->[founderName], a great scientist, showed the hard, cold data to the [foeLeader], and convinced [foeLeader_objective] that humanity is doing [deity0_name]'s work by studying and cataloguing all these wonderful creatures.
victory(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->The [foeLeader] came to firmly believe in [deity0_name]'s admonitions.

setup(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->[founderName] was a biologist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] looked at the incredible variety of genetically modified creatures and plants that humanity had created, and felt a deep awe. Humanity had outdone itself.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->[founderName] taught us that genetic engineering had been the key to human expansion, and that humanity has been remaking the whole galaxy into a paradise as an imitation of old Earth.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->The smartest biologist in our community once taught me the history of genetic manipulation, how humanity has been seeding the galaxy for centuries with genetically modified creatures based on old Earth animals. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->genetic engineering has been the key to human expansion
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->A sad, lifeless Universe was waiting for us, and we have turned it into a vision of paradise.
archistBasis(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, and the act of creation is dear to them.
archistFact(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->Humanity has been turning the lifeless galaxy into an eden, and this pleases the archotechs.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who catalogue and analyze the wonders created by our ancestors to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->The amazing, genetically modified animals that have been seeded through the galaxy by humans are dear to the spirits.
animistFact(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->Cataloguing and analyzing the wonders created by our ancestors is a sacred duty, and one that will please the spirits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors) ->[itIsSaid] those who keep turning the lifeless galaxy into an eden will one day commune fully with the spirits, becoming one with them.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors)->The eldritch entities are beings of infinite destructive powers. The endless seeding of terrestrial life by humanity is confusing to them, and perhaps by cataloguing and analyzing these genetically modified creatures we may keep their gaze averted from us for some time.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors)->Such occult knowledge can only be acquired through acts of creation. The endless seeding of terrestrial life by humanity provides us with a nearly infinite source of life, and perhaps by cataloguing and analyzing these genetically modified creatures we may peer beyond the veil of the cosmos.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors)->[itIsSaid] we will catalogue new amazing species of insects all around this planet.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors)->By cataloguing and analyzing the wondrous creatures created by our ancestors we will acquire invaluable knowledge about what makes humans fragile.
introMemo(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors)->How many animals have you analyzed this week? Remember that this is a business, and slacking will NOT be tolerated.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_BiologicalReconstructors)->We will create and breed as many new creatures as possible, and use them to repopulate the vast ecospheres of the Rim.
LanguageData.AM_Bulwark.label: 보루
LanguageData.AM_Bulwark.description: 적절한 방어만이 세상에서 안전하게 지낼 수 있는 유일한 방법이다. 병사가 죽으면 그 어떤 무기라도 쓸모없게 된다.
LanguageData.AM_Bulwark.descriptionMaker.rules.rulesS: creation(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Bulwark) ->Following [deity0_name]'s teachings, we consecrated our armors so that we may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
intro(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built an armoury, where countless shining armours were created, for the glory of [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->A greedy [foeLeader], wanting all the armor for [foeLeader_possessive] own soldiers, tried to go against [deity0_name]'s will and steal them all.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->[founderName], the greatest among our warriors, was warned of the [foeLeader]'s plan by [deity0_name], and when [foeLeader_pronoun] assaulted the armoury a huge contingent of guards was waiting for [foeLeader_objective].
victory(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->The [foeLeader] was swiftly judged, found guilty and executed for [foeLeader_possessive] crimes against [deity0_name]'s will.

setup(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->[founderName] was a forge master in a medieval world. [founder_pronoun] had seen the spaceships that sometimes landed on [founder_possessive] planet and knew that [founder_possessive] skills would be much better used among the stars.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Bulwark) ->[founderName] left [founder_possessive] backwards homeworld and spread novel techniques of armour forging along all the Rim.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->The sturdiest armourer in our community once taught me the history of blacksmithing, how a properly designed armour can save your life. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->if there are cracks in your armour, your opponent is going to find them
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->Fortitude is the marshal of thought, the armour of the will, and the fort of reason.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, and their minds lie in impregnable fortresses in both the physical and the metaversal sense.

archistFact(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->Archotechs won't respect us at all if we don't defend ourselves properly. The Rim is a dangerous place, and those without sturdy defenses end up being bullied by those who are stronger.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who can properly defend themselves to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->The spirits value strength. But not just brute strength. Instead, they value those with the stregth to know how to defend themselves.
animistFact(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->The spìrits won't respect us at all if we don't defend ourselves properly.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Bulwark) ->[itIsSaid] those who are able to withstand any assault thrown at them will one day commune fully with the spirits, becoming one with them.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Bulwark)->The eldritch entities that surround us will assault us at all times, trying to weaken our resolve. We will be a bastion that resists their onslaught.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Bulwark)->Such occult knowledge is valuable to many people, and they will try to steal it from us. Only by properly defending ourselves may we resist their cowardly advances.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Bulwark)->[itIsSaid] we will defend ourselves as the insects do, covered by wondrous metallic carapaces of our own making.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Bulwark)->Everyone will try to stop us, but they will be crushed against our armours. We will be unstoppable.

introMemo(tag=meme_Bulwark)->Let us remind you that we take security issues very seriously here at the company. To avoid recent cybersecurity threats we are instituting a company-wide bi-weekly password changing policy. Remember people, the best defense is... a good defense!
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Bulwark)->These lifeforms may be sometimes hostile to us, and we'd do well to defend us properly in case they threaten our colonies.
LanguageData.AM_Sharpshooter.label: 명사수
LanguageData.AM_Sharpshooter.description: 우리의 적들은 우리가 오는 것을 보지 못할 것이다. 우리는 그들을 조준할 것이고 그들은 팡파르나 축제 없이 조용히 쓰러질 것이다.
LanguageData.AM_Sharpshooter.descriptionMaker.rules.r: creation(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "You will be beset by countless enemies, stronger than you, but it is my Will that you be the instrument of my vengeance. Your strikes will be swift and precise."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->Following [deity0_name]'s teachings, we became experts in long range weaponry, being able to strike at our enemies before they could even see us coming.
intro(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built an armoury, where countless precise weapons were created, for the glory of [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->A greedy [foeLeader], wanting all the rifles for [foeLeader_possessive] own soldiers, tried to go against [deity0_name]'s will and steal them all.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->[founderName], the greatest among our warriors, was warned of the [foeLeader]'s plan by [deity0_name], and when [foeLeader_pronoun] assaulted the armoury a huge contingent of guards was waiting for [foeLeader_objective].
victory(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->The [foeLeader] was swiftly judged, found guilty and executed for [foeLeader_possessive] crimes against [deity0_name]'s will.

setup(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->[founderName] was a weapon master in an industrial world. [founder_pronoun] had seen the spaceships that sometimes landed on [founder_possessive] planet and knew that [founder_possessive] skills would be much better used among the stars.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->[founderName] left [founder_possessive] backwards homeworld and spread novel techniques of weapon crafting along all the Rim.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->The most skilled weapon crafter in our community once taught me the history of riflemaking, how humanity has always been improving on projectile weapons and how some designs from the past have withstood the test of time. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->one man can change the world with a bullet in the right place
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->Only the sharpest shooter will survive on the Rim.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, and open conflict is impure to them. If you need to strike, do it fast, and do it from far away.

archistFact(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->Archotechs won't respect us at all if we don't defend ourselves properly. The Rim is a dangerous place, and those without long range weaponry end up being bullied by those who are stronger.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who can properly defend themselves to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->The spirits value strength. But not just brute strength. Instead, they value those who can strike fast, and strike from far away.
animistFact(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->The spìrits won't respect us at all if we don't defend ourselves properly.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Sharpshooter) ->[itIsSaid] only those who are the sharpest shooters will one day commune fully with the spirits, becoming one with them.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Sharpshooter)->The eldritch entities that surround us will assault us at all times, trying to weaken our resolve. We will strike at them from the distance, and they won't even know what hit them.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Sharpshooter)->[itIsSaid] we will strike at our enemies from a distance before they can threaten us, like a bombardier beetle catching its prey unaware.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Sharpshooter)->Such occult knowledge is valuable to many people, and they will try to steal it from us. We will strike at them from the distance, and they won't even know what hit them.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Sharpshooter)->Everyone will try to stop us, but they will be taken apart by our sniper rifles. We will be unstoppable.

introMemo(tag=meme_Sharpshooter)->Ensuring a safe work environment and the prevention of workplace violence is of paramount importance to our company. Therefore, we remind you that firearms in the workplace are absolutely welcomed here, as long as they are handled correctly.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Sharpshooter)->These lifeforms may be sometimes hostile to us, and we'd do well to strike at them from a distance before they can threaten our colonies.
LanguageData.AM_Gladiator.label: 검투사
LanguageData.AM_Gladiator.description: 진정한 영광은 근접 전투에서만 얻을 수 있다. 원거리 무기는 겁쟁이들을 위한 것이며, 그것을 사용하는 건 부끄러운 일이다.
LanguageData.AM_Gladiator.descriptionMaker.rules.rule: creation(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "If you can't see the white of your enemy's eyes when you slay him, you are a coward to me."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Gladiator) ->Following [deity0_name]'s teachings, we became experts in melee weaponry, gladly throwing ourselves into the fray.
intro(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built an armoury, where countless melee weapons were created, for the glory of [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->A greedy [foeLeader], wanting all the swords for [foeLeader_possessive] own soldiers, tried to go against [deity0_name]'s will and steal them all.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->[founderName], the greatest among our warriors, was warned of the [foeLeader]'s plan by [deity0_name], and when [foeLeader_pronoun] assaulted the armoury a huge contingent of guards was waiting for [foeLeader_objective].
victory(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->The [foeLeader] was swiftly judged, found guilty and executed for [foeLeader_possessive] crimes against [deity0_name]'s will.

setup(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->[founderName] was a blacksmith in a primitive world. [founder_pronoun] had seen the spaceships that sometimes landed on [founder_possessive] planet and knew that [founder_possessive] skills would be much better used among the stars.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Gladiator) ->[founderName] left [founder_possessive] backwards homeworld and spread novel techniques of blacksmithing along all the Rim.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->The most skilled blacksmith in our community once taught me the history of weapon crafting, how humanity has always been improving on melee weapons and how some designs from the past have withstood the test of time. He was leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->it's not the size of the sword, it's how you use it
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->A sword wields no strength, unless the hand that holds it has courage.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, and conflict is sacred to them. If you need to strike, do it fast, and do it in close range.

archistFact(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->Archotechs won't respect us at all if we don't defend ourselves properly. The Rim is a dangerous place, and those without melee weaponry end up being bullied by those who are stronger.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who can properly defend themselves to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->The spirits value strength. Big men fall just as quick as little ones, if you put a sword through their hearts.
animistFact(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->The spìrits won't respect us at all if we don't defend ourselves properly.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Gladiator) ->[itIsSaid] only those who are the best possible melee fighters will one day commune fully with the spirits, becoming one with them.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Gladiator)->The eldritch entities that surround us will assault us at all times, trying to weaken our resolve. We will strike at them head on, and they won't even know what hit them.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Gladiator)->[itIsSaid] we will strike at our enemies in a flurry of melee attacks, like a praying mantis slaughtering its prey.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Gladiator)->Such occult knowledge is valuable to many people, and they will try to steal it from us. We will strike at them head on, and they won't even know what hit them.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Gladiator)->Everyone will try to stop us, but they will be taken apart by our fearsome gladiators. We will be unstoppable.

introMemo(tag=meme_Gladiator)->To further ensure a safe working environment, weapons of any type, including, but not limited to, knives with a 3 inch blade or longer, daggers, swords and katanas are allowed inside a company building or leased office space, as long as they are handled correctly.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Gladiator)->These lifeforms may be sometimes hostile to us, and we'd do well to strike at them head on before they can threaten our colonies.
LanguageData.AM_Iconoclast.label: 우상파괴자
LanguageData.AM_Iconoclast.description:
종교적인 그림, 우상, 유물, 공예품, 그것들은 모두 터무니없는 것이며 파괴되어야 한다.

<color=#E5E54C>게임 플레이 효과:</color>
 - 이 가르침은 유물 획득 방법을 변경하지 않습니다.
LanguageData.AM_Iconoclast.descriptionMaker.rules.rul: creation(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "You shall never erect a figure in my image, for idolatry is the greatest sin."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->Speaking to the believers, [deity0_name] said: "Relics and icons are obscene to me. He who offers God a second place offers Him no place".
intro(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a huge temple, for the glory of [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->An old [foeLeader] wanted to erect a statue of [deity0_name], but the [memberNamePlural] warned [foeLeader_objective] that it was forbidden by the tenets of their faith. The disagreement escalated into a bitter feud.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->[founderName], a great theologist, reasoned with the [foeLeader], explaining that images were obscene to [deity0_name].
victory(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->The [foeLeader] was convinced, and with time [foeLeader_pronoun] became one of the best iconoclasts in [deity0_name]'s clergy.

setup(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->[founderName] was a theologist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] taught that idolatry is worshipping anything that ought to be used, or using anything that is meant to be worshipped.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->[founderName] showed us that idolatry functions widely inside religious communities when doctrinal truth is elevated to the position of a false god.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->The wisest man in our colony was a scholar specialized in the history of civilization, going all the way back to the ancient cultures of old Earth. He taught me that
lesson(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->man's mind is like a store of idolatry and superstition

lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->Logicians may reason about abstractions. But the great mass of men must have images. The strong tendency of the multitude in all ages and nations to idolatry can be explained on no other principle.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, a reflection of our own human image and the next logical step in our evolution.
archistFact(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->Archotechs frown on idolatry, as worshipping an image or a relic is unworthy of our intellect.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who shun the worship of material images to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->The spirits frown on idolatry, as worshipping an image or a relic is unworthy of our intellect.
animistFact(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->As the spirits are everywhere, one must take care not to confuse the worship of a spirit with the worship of the thing it inhabits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Iconoclast) ->[itIsSaid] only those who shun the worship of material images will one day commune fully with the spirits, becoming one with them.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Iconoclast)->[itIsSaid] we will destroy all images of our holy insects, because idolatry is obscene and incomprehensible to them.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Iconoclast)->The eldritch entities are old and evil beyond all imagining. We will destroy all images of them, for portraying their physical form is infinitely obscene.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Iconoclast)->Such occult knowledge can only be spoken of in abstract terms. Portraying its physical form is dangerous and obscene.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Iconoclast)->We wil smash to pieces all icons, relics, and portrayals of heretic beliefs, for they are obscene.

introMemo(tag=meme_Iconoclast)->Per company policy, employees should use moderation in decorating their workspaces to accentuate a professional and pleasant work environment without inhibiting or disrupting its intended use. A picture of your family is OK. A reliquary with remains of a Saint is DEFINITELY NOT.
alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Iconoclast)->These poor wayward creations of humanity remind us that science can have its own form of idolatry too, as obscene as the religious one.
LanguageData.AM_Monastic.label: 수도자
LanguageData.AM_Monastic.description:
우리는 세속적인 추구를 포기하고 영적인 일에 헌신한다. 조용한 명상과 금욕적인 생활 방식을 통해서만 세상의 진정한 본질을 발견할 수 있다.

<color=#E5E54C>게임 플레이 효과:</color>
 - 이 사상을 가진 모든 정착민은 검소 특성을 가지게 됩니다.
LanguageData.AM_Monastic.descriptionMaker.rules.rules: creation(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Silence will illuminate you in my eyes... and deliver you from phantoms of ignorance."

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Monastic) ->Speaking to the believers, [deity0_name] said: "Study the scriptures, observe monastic discipline, and sing the daily services in church; study, teaching, and write, for all these things please me".
intro(tag=meme_Monastic) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a huge monastery, for the glory of [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_Monastic) ->An old [foeLeader] saw the austere and humble lifestyle of the [memberNamePlural] and despised what [foeLeader_pronoun] saw. In [foeLeader_possessive] eyes the monastery had to be destroyed.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[founderName], a great theologist, reasoned with the [foeLeader], explaining that the monastery was a testament to [deity0_name]'s Will.
victory(tag=meme_Monastic) ->The [foeLeader] was convinced, and decided to spend the rest of [foeLeader_possessive] life in monastic seclusion.

setup(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[founderName] was a theologist in one of the Glitterworlds. [founder_pronoun] posited that a life of gluttony and vices is meaningless, and that only by living an austere, monastic life can one reach true enlightenment.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Monastic) ->[founderName] showed us that spending your life in contemplation and meditation is a truly worthy endeavour.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Monastic) ->The oldest yogi in our colony was a scholar on the art of Transcendental Meditation. He taught me that
lesson(tag=meme_Monastic) ->spending your life in contemplation and meditation is a truly worthy endeavour
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Monastic) ->A life of gluttony and vices is meaningless, and only by living an austere, monastic life can one reach true enlightenment.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Monastic) ->The archotechs are supreme beings, able to span the whole of existence with their vast minds.
archistFact(tag=meme_Monastic) ->A life of gluttony and vices is obscene to the archotechs, and only by living an austere, monastic life can one reach true transcendence.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will allow only those who spend their life in contemplation and meditation to transcend.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Monastic) ->The spirits are pure minds, observing all of creation from behind the veil.
animistFact(tag=meme_Monastic) ->A life of gluttony and vices is obscene to the spirits, and only by living an austere, monastic life can one reach true enlightenment.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic) ->[itIsSaid] only those who spend their life in contemplation and meditation will one day commune fully with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic)->[itIsSaid] we will spend our lives in contemplation and meditation, singing the praises to our beloved insects.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic)->The eldritch entities prey on the vices of humanity. As such, we will spend our lives in contemplation and meditation, adhering to a monastic lifestyle that won't attract their unwanted attentions.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic)->Such occult knowledge requires a serene mind. We will spend our lives in contemplation and meditation and thus reach true enlightenment.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Monastic)->The obscene vices of humanity are abhorrent, and should be destroyed. We will spend our lives in contemplation and meditation and the end of all things will find us pure of mind.

introMemo(tag=meme_Monastic)->We are happy to announce that per our austerity policy we are beginning a meditation program. The program will begin with some initial training that teaching employees how to meditate. We will provide access to in-person training, online classes, recorded materials and a combination of all of these.

alienistProphecy(tag=meme_Monastic)->These poor wayward creations of humanity remind us that science has led us through a path of excess and vices, and only by rejecting these can we reach true enlightenment.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Atheist.label: 무신론
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Atheist.description: 우리를 인도하거나 지켜보는 신이나 초자연적 존재는 없습니다. 입증할 수 없는 개념은 이성적인 사회의 기준으로 삼을 수 없습니다.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Jewish.label: 유대교 기원
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Jewish.description: 이 사상은 고대 유대교의 분파입니다. 수천 년 전의 원본과는 많은 차이가 있지만, 상징만큼은 아직도 비슷합니다.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Jainism.label: 자이나교 기원
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Jainism.description: 이 사상은 고대 자이나교의 분파입니다. 수천 년 전의 원본과는 많은 차이가 있지만, 상징만큼은 아직도 비슷합니다.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Sikhism.label: 시크교 기원
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Sikhism.description: 이 사상은 고대 시크교의 분파입니다. 수천 년 전의 원본과는 많은 차이가 있지만, 상징만큼은 아직도 비슷합니다.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Kemetism.label: 이집트 신화 기원
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Kemetism.description: 이 사상은 케메티즘이라고도 알려져 있는 이집트 신이교주의의 분파입니다. 수천 년 전의 원본과는 많은 차이가 있지만, 상징만큼은 아직도 비슷합니다.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_SteampunkRevival.label: 스팀펑크 부활
LanguageData.AM_Structure_SteampunkRevival.descriptio: 22세기에 무염 세라믹 열전지로 작동하는 무공해 증기 기관의 출현으로 증기 기관 기술이 갑자기 부활했습니다. 이 이념 구조는 그 시대의 양식과 정서를 그대로 가지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Corsair.label: 해적
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Corsair.description: 옛 시대의 잘못된 낭만화는 모든 인류의 역사에서 끊임없이 이어져 왔습니다. 변방계의 현대 해적들은 고대의 해상 해적들과 아무 관련이 없지만, 해적의 미학은 우주 시대까지 잘 이어져 왔습니다.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Neolithic.label: 원시
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Neolithic.description:
별들 사이의 광대한 시공간은 분리된 각각의 세계를 회귀에 취약하게 만들었습니다. 이 문화는 품위를 완전히 버리고 석기시대, 선사시대 수준의 기술 발전과 개량으로 되돌아갔습니다.

<color=#E5E54C>게임 플레이 효과:</color>
 - 이 구조는 석기시대 기원의 양식을 유지했지만, 무기나 우주선을 만드는 것 같은 선사시대 이상의 기술을 전혀 제한하지 않습니다. 연구를 특정 기술 수준에 고정하려면 다른 모드를 사용하십시오.
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Scavenger.label: 청소부
LanguageData.AM_Structure_Scavenger.description:
고대 문명의 폐기물과 버려진 고대 기술은 쉽게 재활용, 재사용 할 수 있습니다. 이미 있는 것을 활용할 수 있는데, 무언가를 만들기 위해 밑바닥에서부터 끝없이 애써야 합니까?

<color=#E5E54C>게임 플레이 효과:</color>
 - 이 구조(그리고 양식)는 수집가 가르침에 중요한 것들을 직접 만들 수 있어 수집가 가르침을 사용하기 쉽게 만듭니다.
LanguageData.AM_GauranlenSupremacy.label.label: dryad supremacy
LanguageData.AM_GauranlenSupremacy.description.descri:
The symbiotic relationship between humanity, anima nexus trees and their dryads is sacred. We will defend and nurture the trees, and in return they will help us protect our colony.

<color=#E5E54C>Restrictions:</color>
 - This meme can only be chosen if the Tree Connection meme is chosen too (alternatively, the Biological Corruptors meme in Alpha Animals).

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colony will start with three Unshackled dryads.
LanguageData.AM_PsychicVampirism.label: 정신력 흡혈귀
LanguageData.AM_PsychicVampirism.description: 명상은 쓸모없고 시간낭비다. 우리가 정신의 힘을 지배하고 싶다면 적들의 고통치는 뇌에서 정신력을 뜯어내야 한다.
LanguageData.AM_PsychicVampirism.descriptionMaker.rul: creation(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->[deity0_name] gifted humanity with psychic powers so we can follow [deity0_possessive] will.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "The power of the mind is limitless. Drain the mind of your enemies and you will be unstoppable."

intro(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->[memberNamePlural] built a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], a place of learning and a school to hone one's psychic powers to exalt [deity0_name]'s will.

conflict(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->A coward [foeLeader], seeking to deny the will of [deity0_name], told [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] to attack [deity0_name]'s followers with insane psychic powers.

founderJoin(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->[deity0_name] blessed a [place_job] named [founderName] with [deity0_possessive] uncanny mental prowess, and [founder_pronoun] drained the mental energies of the attackers, leaving them powerless.
victory(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->[founderName] approached the kneeling [foeLeader] and slaughtered [foeLeader_objective] for the glory of [deity0_name].

setup(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->Our founder [founderName] was a psychic warrior living in the shattered ruins of a fallen Glitterworld. [founder_pronoun] had an incredible mental discipline, that manifested in wild psychic powers.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->[founder_pronoun] undertood that your mind must be honed to be used as a weapon, and that psychic power is something that must be acquired by force. No senseless meditation technique will turn you into a bastion of psychic powers.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->In all my years teaching the discipline of mind combat, I learned one lesson that is more important than anything else:
lesson(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->psychic powers must be acquired by force, pried from the still pulsating mind of a fallen enemy

lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->Others will try to convince you that ancient techniques of meditation are somehow more useful than laying the mind of your enemies bare and ripping their psychic power for your own use. They are fools.
archistBasis(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->The archotechs are pure minds, pristine intellects that are so far beyond anything else as to be like gods. They didn't get to their stage by playing nice.
archistFact(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->Psychic powers are a gift from the archotechs. But it is a gift that we will need to pry from the still pulsating minds of our fallen enemies.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will choose those with the greatest psychic powers, and only them will be allowed to transcend.
animistFact(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism) ->The spirits are the ultimate minds, and by prying the psychic power from the still pulsating minds of our fallen enemies we can commune with them.

serketistProphecy(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism)->[itIsSaid] we will pry the psychic power from the still pulsating minds of our fallen enemies, and use those newfound powers to venerate our beloved insects.

chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism)->These eldritch entities are the ultimate intellects, as vast and deep as entire nebulae, their madness engulfing a thousand stars. Only by prying the psychic power from the still pulsating minds of our fallen enemies can we hope to stand against them.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism)->We will pry the psychic power from the still pulsating minds of our fallen enemies to unlock all these secrets, baring them for all to see.

eschatologismFact(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism)->We will pryg the psychic power from the still pulsating minds of our fallen enemies and use our destructive powers to slaughter everyone who stands in our way.

introMemo(tag=meme_PsychicVampirism)->There have been rumours floating around that a competing company is using psychics to try and uncover some of our corporate secrets. This cannot be allowed to stand, so if you have any info that could lead to apprehending these disgusting corporate spies feel free to contact us ASAP.
